problem.title: The Problem
problem.subtitle: The real problem isn't development speed — it's team alignment.
problem.quote: Prompt engineering is dead. The future is spec engineering.
problems: Vague ideas → vague specs → vague products
Too much time spent on back-and-forth communication about requirements, leaving little time for actual development
AI tools help you write code, but no one helps you clarify what to write
problem.solution: Say goodbye to endless back-and-forth communication between PMs, engineers, and QA. With Herewegoal, you can independently transform ideas into clear, executable plans.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.subtitle: From idea to validated spec — with AI-assisted steps.
solutions: Start with a prompt — describe your feature in natural language
Auto‑generate examples — preview behavior before coding
Validate assumptions — fast checks with users, metrics, and AI
Create testable specs — clear acceptance criteria that prevent scope creep
solution.conclusion: In a world where ideas and execution are cheap, smart validation is the key.
